activities: 1. Customer information. We receive and store personal information about prospective, current, or former customers/employees who are residents of the EU, Switzerland or the EEA. 2. Employee information. We receive and store employee information. 3. Back-up service. We also provide data backup services to our customers. Backup Service is a cloud-based service provided by MongoDB for backing up and restoring MongoDB. Generally, any personal data collected, processed, used, and transferred is subject to MongoDB’s Website Privacy Policy.
eucountries: Finland, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization Data (Human Resources Data) - manually processed. Customer Data - manually processed. Vendor Data - manually processed
recoursemech: If you believe that we have not adhered to this Privacy Policy, please contact us by e-mail at info@mongodb.com.  We will do our best to address your concerns.  If you feel that your complaint has been addressed incompletely, we invite you to let us know for further investigation.  If we are unable to reach a resolution to the dispute, we will settle the dispute exclusively under the rules of the American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA U.S.-EU & U.S.-SWISS Safe Harbor program).
